name: RIGS Mechanized Combat League
summary: RIGS: Mechanized Combat League is a first-person shooter sports video game developed by Guerrilla Cambridge and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 4 console and its virtual reality head-mounted display PlayStation VR.
info:
• 中文名: RIGS:机械化战斗联盟
  • 平台: PlayStation 4
  • 游戏类型: First-person shooter, Sports game
  • 游戏引擎: Decima
  • 发行日期: 13 October 2016
